Html:
Hi,

First ,congrats on the great work .

Second, I am thinking about using Kigg for a site a bit different where a single user will be able to
create an article, and not just link to an existing article.

So from you experience which HtmlEditor or functionality would you use for this.
I know that the existing RichEditor does not have functionality that I'd like to add,such as adding images to an article ,provide more formatting options etc.

Thanks
